title: A Dissertation on the Passions
sourceDesc: The first more or less complete edition of Humeâ€™s <cite>Essays and Treatises on Several Subjects</cite>, his collected philosophical works, was published in 1758, although each of its component works were published separately before then, and an incomplete version (predating the <cite>Four Dissertations</cite>) was published in 1753.
